project.description:
After running this build the Microservice Production Node should be running. You can check the Version with the following urls:

  • Catalog Frontend Version
  • Cart Microservice Manifest
  • Product Microservice Manifest
  • Navigation Microservice Manifest

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: ssh vagrant@app-server-node-4 -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -v <<EOF sudo su apt-get update echo **************************************** echo * Remove Application * echo **************************************** apt-get clean echo **************************************** echo * Install Application * echo **************************************** apt-get -y install shop-registration-frontend apt-get -y install shop-catalog-frontend apt-get -y install shop-checkout-frontend apt-get -y install shop-product-service apt-get -y install shop-navigation-service apt-get -y install shop-cart-service EOF
